file_content.text: Only a fool would try to run an Imperial blockade.
I found the Republic survivors. They put up a fight, but they're all yours now.
Excellent! I'll be sure to make them feel right at home.
Capital work out there. Here's a little something for your time.
Remember, we want those Republic soldiers alive--beaten, bruised and battered, but alive.
My lord! Colonel Valda--your loyal Imperial, veteran sportsman and your humble servant.
Ah, a fellow hunter. Colonel Valda, loyal Imperial and sporting enthusiast.
Gotcha, you--ha, apologies, sir! Mistook you for a--never mind. Colonel Valda, at your service.
A-ha! Ah--oh, sorry. Thought you might be--never mind. I'm Colonel Valda.
You haven't seen any Republic types in the area, have you? Maybe running, hiding or otherwise fleeing?
You really think they'd come anywhere near me?
They'd never show their faces.
I imagine they'd sooner approach a rakghoul, my lord.
Who are these worms you're chasing?
"Republic types"?
I see plenty of "Republic types." Usually shoot them. Give me specifics.
I need more details.
They're prisoners of war, or soon will be.
If I had, they wouldn't still be running.
That should be obvious.
Worth a shot.
What's going on, Colonel?
None that spring to mind.
Cowards aren't my concern.
Drat. Then the trail's gone cold.
Why should I tell you?
Hoping to catch them yourself, eh? I see how it is.
The Vigilance destroyed a Republic cruiser not long ago. Brilliant show, but apparently escape pods jettisoned from the cruiser, made it planetside.
We're to bring in the survivors--alive, preferably. Could always use an extra pair of eyes, if you're interested.
If anyone made it out alive, I'll bring them in.
Count me in.
Very good!
Where are they?
The escape pods crashed somewhere in this vicinity. The Republic lambs won't be far.
Here, you'll need these--shock collars, extra strength.
Should keep the prisoners in line. Battery's been charged, too. Make it a long walk back for them.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Too bad. Still, those Republic cowards can't hide forever!
We've got the Republic on the run now!
